entities.name: diadem
entities.description: The diadem is described as being pulled from Harry's wrist and held up. It was still hot, blackened with soot, but had tiny words etched upon it.

entities.name: horcruxes

entities.name: carrows

entities.name: crabbe

entities.name: hermione
